page.title: 06PRUDHOE HOSPITAL
page.content: One of the major employers in Prudhoe is Prudhoe Hospital for mentally disturbed people. The Hospital, which caters for 1000 patients, aged between 5 and 75, consists of approximately 50 different homes, each with their own dormitories and bathroom. Each home has facilities for cooking, washing and a staffroom. Nurses work shift work - three days on then three days off. Therefore if a nurse is working one Tuesday then that nurse will work on the following two Saturdays. Apart from the nurses/ charge nurses, there are also domestic staff who are employed very cheaply. In Prudhoe Hospital, apart from the homes, there are also independant homes where patients whose condition has improved dramatically prepare for independant life in society.
